title: Abbee
author: Abbee
content: My Ex and I started dating as we both attend the same church but different parish in same town. The relationship became long distance because we both attend different schools in different state.The long-distance relationship had been going strong, with countless video calls, thoughtful messages, and plans for each other.Â However, as months turned into years, the distance began to take its toll on us, he find fault in everything I say or do. I had this feeling he was cheating on me with one particular girl but whenever I tried to confront him, he always denied the allegation.One fateful day, I traveled over to his school to spend few days with him. On getting to his house, I saw him coming out of the bathroom with the same girl I once accused him of dating. The duo were coming out of the bathroom, while the girl was putting on Â his singlet and boxer. OMG, I felt annoyed, angry and sad ðŸ˜¢. The guy couldn't say anything as he was too dumbfound to speak, I guess he wasn't expecting me to come on time.I had to go back home heartbroken, I ended the relationship, it was very painful 4 years relationship down the drain but whenever I think about it now, am greatful I did.#Say no to Toxic relationship

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I once had a bad breakup with this beautiful girl named Cynthia. We start dating because we had courses together and thought because we were pursuing the future that we would end of being married. We had been dating now for about 10 months and really thought we had established good communication and trust between us. I took her to a party I got invited by a friend of mine. At the party, I did not realize my ex-girlfriend would end up being there too. I had some drinks I do not know why I saw her and gave her a kiss as if I have not seen her in years. Cynthia saw me and was shocked that I had embarrassed her in front of other people. I followed her to her car and tried asking her for forgiveness. She told me she never wanted to be with me anymore.I was devasted because how could I have allowed that to happen when we were having such a good time? But instead, the person that truly matter to me and loved me walked away and left crushed because of my mistake.
